thread.section_title: Mother ‘orally raped three-month old son to make child porn’ – Metro
thread.title: Mother ‘orally raped three-month old son to make child porn’
thread.title_full: Mother ‘orally raped three-month old son to make child porn’

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Mother ‘orally raped three-month old son to make child porn’
text:
Jazmine Nichole Pacyga has been arrested (Picture: Police handout) A mother has been arrested after she allegedly orally raped her three-month old son.
Jazmine Nichole Pacyga, 19, is also alleged to have produced child porn, according to Michigan Live .
Isis guard quits 'after seeing sex slave, 15, bleed to death following brutal ra Court reports say that she has been charged with first degree criminal sexual conduct and manufacturing sexually abusive material following the incident on February 5.
Her parental rights have been suspended and her bond has been set at $200,000. (£160,000).
Her son is currently being looked after by local authorities in Muskegon Township, Michigan, and they are trying to track down his father.
She faces a possible life sentence if convicted and will appear in court later this month.
Police are now trying to track down the baby’s father (Picture: Facebook)
